channel.title: How Do I Add Shops & Add New Things To Shops?
channel.description: I Am Running A Ham Server Based On Pimpscape; And I Would Like To Know How To Add New Items & Shops; Please Help. [br][size=1]Posted on: May 07, 2007, 09:35:37 PM[/size][hr] cm00n someoen..

item.title: How Do I Add Shops & Add New Things To Shops?
item.dc:creator: @_0mfg0rz ~0mfg0rz~
item.description:
@_0mfg0rz wrote:

simply go to the “ultimate server guide” and read there teaches you …

hope i helped

~0mfg0rz~[br][size=1]Posted on: May 08, 2007, 07:07:00 PM[/size][hr][quote=“Sinister-Scape, post:6, topic:91171”]To add stuff in a shop, go to shops.cfg and lets say you open the nulidion shops dude and if you havent changed it then it should say like Black or black armour, well search for that in shops.cfg and when u find it, the 2 2 dont mess with for now and then after that type the item id and then press tab and type the ammount u want in the shops, and on, and on[/quote]
yah if you dont get that just go to the tut section and read it

Read full topic
item.source: How Do I Add Shops & Add New Things To Shops?

item.title: How Do I Add Shops & Add New Things To Shops?
item.dc:creator: @Sinister-Scape Sinister-Scape
item.description:
@Sinister-Scape wrote:

To add stuff in a shop, go to shops.cfg and lets say you open the nulidion shops dude and if you havent changed it then it should say like Black or black armour, well search for that in shops.cfg and when u find it, the 2 2 dont mess with for now and then after that type the item id and then press tab and type the ammount u want in the shops, and on, and on

Read full topic
item.source: How Do I Add Shops & Add New Things To Shops?
